name: Wheatfarm Fantasy
description:
Explore and battle your way in this farm-tastic fantasy adventure! Find upgrades scattered around the countryside and by levelling up to face off against the Frost Eagles that captured your friend; Sheepie!

6 different species to battle and master and 13 different skills to unlock and battle fearsome foes! 

WASD - MOVEMENT

SPACEBAR - INTERACT

ESC - MENU

F12 - Reset to Title Screen

Made in 9 days for Godot Wild Jam #51
